backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining product, order, user profile, carousel, and inquiry types with in‑memory maps for storage and site content defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend React files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes across the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with layout, lazy‑loaded pages, profile‑setup flow, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin UI to upload, optimize, edit, reorder, and toggle homepage carousel slides.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Admin tool for managing category‑specific carousel images and redirect URLs with image optimization.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin interface to view customer inquiries and send responses.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin panel for viewing orders, changing order status, and printing formatted order details.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating and editing products, handling text fields, media uploads, previews, and optimization before submitting via product mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete products, showing product cards and invoking the product form modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Form-based admin panel for viewing and updating site-wide static content such as contact info and policies.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Client carousel component fetching category slides and providing autoplay, hover pause, transitions, and click redirects.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: A category-specific image carousel with auto-rotation, hover pause, navigation, and optional redirect behavior.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CouponC: Checkout widget allowing users to apply or remove coupon codes with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiQrCo: Generates and displays a UPI payment QR code and provides a copy-to-clipboard action.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: Wraps children in a div with a data attribute to scope customer page styles.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Footer component showing branding, contact info, policies, dynamic footer text, and copyright details.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: A homepage carousel that fetches slides, auto-rotates, supports navigation, and redirects on slide click.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main site layout with header, navigation, authentication handling, category links, and footer.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal for viewing order details, status, cancellation options, and performing order cancellation.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Displays product videos and images in a carousel with navigation controls and square aspect ratio.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form collecting basic user profile data and saving it via actor API with validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Displays skeleton placeholders as a loading fallback for lazy‑loaded routes.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file for a Stripe setup modal component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Hook that toggles a body attribute to apply admin-specific styling while admin views are active.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculations, persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: React Query hooks to fetch and update category carousel images and redirect URLs using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook returning a constant 'split' footer variant.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, homepage and category carousels, and other backend data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, brand colors, utilities, and component styles including shimmering and gold effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard displaying stats and management tabs, gated by admin access and populated via multiple data queries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, handling authentication, empty states, item listing, quantity updates, and removal.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Empty placeholder page for the Anklets category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Empty placeholder page for the Bridal Jewellery category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty placeholder page for handling missing categories.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Reusable template that displays a category header, carousels, and filtered products with cart actions.
frontend/src/pages/categories/EarringsPa: Empty placeholder page for the Earrings category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Category page instance using the template for lab-grown diamond jewellery.
frontend/src/pages/categories/NecklacePa: Empty placeholder page for the Necklace category.
Empty placeholder page for the Rings category.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles the checkout flow including address entry, coupon logic, UPI payment options, and order creation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form for authenticated users to submit inquiries, with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Shows authenticated users their order history and inquiries with status indicators and order detail modal support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays product listings with a carousel, allowing users to view items, add to cart, or buy now.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a confirmation message after successful payment with navigation options to dashboard or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Page displaying products filtered by category with carousels, authentication checks, and cart actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail view with media carousel, quantity controls, cart actions, and category-based carousels.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileDetailsPage.ts: Profile editing page that loads user data, validates input, and saves changes with authentication checks.
frontend/src/utils/device.ts: Utility to detect mobile devices using userAgentData with a user-agent fallback.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Client-side utilities to resize/compress images and generate preview URLs, with simple video handling.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Pricing helpers for cart subtotal, coupon validation, discount calculation, and INR formatting.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines the ProductCategory interface and a list of category objects, plus helpers to fetch and validate categories and build select options.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Provides functions to build standard and app-specific UPI payment URIs, including preset details for Aurelie Fine Jewellery.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom themes, colors, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for restoring the homepage carousel and updating Buy Now button text color.
